pr_title: implement new extension API on ThreeWindingsTransformerPhaseAngleClock

timeline.message:
implement new extension API on ThreeWindingsTransformerPhaseAngleClock

Signed-off-by: Jérémy LABOUS <jlabous@silicom.fr>

timeline.bodyText: Please divide this into two methods withPhaseAngleClockLeg2(int phaseAngleClockLeg2) and withPhaseAngleClockLeg3(int phaseAngleClockLeg3). The purpose of such a pattern in adders is to allow to set parameters independently and on the fly).
timeline.author: MioRtia

timeline.message:
take remark in account

Signed-off-by: Jérémy LABOUS <jlabous@silicom.fr>
